snippet: Arsene Wenger will be an impossible act to follow and Arsenal cannot count on being in the Champions League every season once their French manager leaves, the club's former vice-chairman David Dein said on Monday....

headline.main: Wenger Is Impossible Act to Follow at Arsenal, Says Dein
headline.print_headline: Wenger Is Impossible Act to Follow at Arsenal, Says Dein

lead_paragraph: Arsene Wenger will be an impossible act to follow and Arsenal cannot count on being in the Champions League every season once their French manager leaves, the club's former vice-chairman David Dein said on Monday.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion are charging 1993 ticket prices for this weekend's FA Cup third-round tie at home to Bristol City to entice fans to the Hawthorns but manager Tony Pulis fears fixture congestion is undermining the competition....

headline.main: West Brom Up for the Cup, but Pulis Annoyed by Schedule
headline.print_headline: West Brom Up for the Cup, but Pulis Annoyed by Schedule

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion are charging 1993 ticket prices for this weekend's FA Cup third-round tie at home to Bristol City to entice fans to the Hawthorns but manager Tony Pulis fears fixture congestion is undermining the competition.

snippet: Stoke midfielder Xherdan Shaqiri netted two fine goals to lead his team to a comfortable 2-0 win at struggling Hull City in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Sublime Shaqiri Double Lifts Stoke to Win at Hull
headline.print_headline: Sublime Shaqiri Double Lifts Stoke to Win at Hull

lead_paragraph: Stoke midfielder Xherdan Shaqiri netted two fine goals to lead his team to a comfortable 2-0 win at struggling Hull City in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Russia captain Roman Shirokov has joined CSKA Moscow on a six-month deal with the option of an extension, the club said in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.main: Russia Captain Shirokov Joins CSKA Moscow
headline.print_headline: Russia Captain Shirokov Joins CSKA Moscow

lead_paragraph: Russia captain Roman Shirokov has joined CSKA Moscow on a six-month deal with the option of an extension, the club said in a statement on Tuesday.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis has been ordered to pay 3.7 million pounds to former club Crystal Palace  after losing a High Court fight....

headline.print_headline: WBA Manager Pulis Must Pay Palace 3.7 Million Pounds

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis has been ordered to pay 3.7 million pounds to former club Crystal Palace  after losing a High Court fight.

snippet: Striker Jamie Vardy is likely to turn down a move to Arsenal and stay at Premier League Champions Leicester City, the north London club's manager Arsene Wenger has said....

headline.main: Vardy Will Stay at Leicester, Says Arsenal's Wenger
headline.print_headline: Vardy Will Stay at Leicester, Says Arsenal's Wenger

lead_paragraph: Striker Jamie Vardy is likely to turn down a move to Arsenal and stay at Premier League Champions Leicester City, the north London club's manager Arsene Wenger has said.

snippet: Middlesbrough moved away from the relegation zone with a 1-0 win over fellow strugglers Hull City thanks to a second-half header from midfielder Gaston Ramirez in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: Middlesbrough Edge Hull Thanks to Ramirez Header
headline.print_headline: Middlesbrough Edge Hull Thanks to Ramirez Header

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough moved away from the relegation zone with a 1-0 win over fellow strugglers Hull City thanks to a second-half header from midfielder Gaston Ramirez in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Crystal Palace must turn their season around by beating Watford when they travel to Vicarage Road in the Premier League on Dec. 26 and lift the atmosphere of doom and gloom that has descended on the club, midfielder James McArthur has said....

headline.main: Palace Must Beat Watford to Stave Off Gloom, Says McArthur
headline.print_headline: Palace Must Beat Watford to Stave Off Gloom, Says McArthur

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace must turn their season around by beating Watford when they travel to Vicarage Road in the Premier League on Dec. 26 and lift the atmosphere of doom and gloom that has descended on the club, midfielder James McArthur has said.
